name: Crispy Tower Defence
description:
Small tower defense game.

Place towers to stop the enemies from reaching your base. Your score is how much money you have at the end, so be conservative!

Controls:

  • Move the cursor: Arrow keys or WASD .
  • Move the cursor faster: Hold Z.
  • Interact: X.
  • Start the wave: Space.

Buildings can be refunded, but only before the wave that they were created in. Once the wave starts, the buildings cannot be destroyed or moved.

Made with smol.
